result.arabic_text: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ
result.translation: Abemeye rero Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bagakora n’ivyiza bitegetswe, bazogumirizwa akabanga ku vyaha vyabo ntibabihanirwe mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, bazonaronka n’impano zubashwe kandi zamaho mu Bwami bw’ijuru;
